```vue
<template>
    <div class="pad-l5">
        <ui-badge>badge</ui-badge>
        <ui-badge theme="success" removable @remove="onRemove">badge</ui-badge>
    </div>
</template>
<script>
import UiBadge from './Badge.vue';

export default {
    components: { UiBadge },
    methods: {
        onRemove() {
            alert('remove badge');
        },
    },
};
</script>
```
